content: I've long had a task on my list to define a way for there to be additional terminology services made available to the FHIR tools. not just tx.fhir.org. See https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179239-tooling/topic/Additional.20Terminology.20Services for a proposal and discussion

@Grahame Grieve Thank-you for queuing up this capability and posting about it to this stream. @Reuben Daniels may have already reached out to you, but in case he has not, would you be available to join the next or upcoming TSMG call re: this facility / arrangement?
5PM Eastern, Tuesday 26 October. I think that'll be 8AM (AEDT) on Wednesday 27 October in Melbourne.
